title: On the hop
creator_contributor_role: Animation and Interactive Media (AIM) RMIT, production facilities
abstract: A Kangaroo returns to her roots to discover how her other animal friends have fared
description: One of 6 works selected by AIM director David Atkinson as representing the best interactive work produced by the AIM centre up until 2004. A Kangaroo returns to her roots to discover how her other animal friends have fared since she's been away. This handrawn interactive animation has great style and storytelling
part_of_compliation_title_or_vod_package: Compilation title; B1006679; AIM graduate interactive collection of exemplary works 1992-2004; Active; 1992-2004
